thread.title: Last blast of summer: Top end-of-summer travel deals - 2015 [Photos]
thread.title_full: Last blast of summer: Top end-of-summer travel deals - 2015 [Photos]

title: Last blast of summer: Top end-of-summer travel deals - 2015 [Photos]
text:
By Nicole Feenstra , Postmedia Network First posted: Wednesday, August 12, 2015 08:00 AM EDT Last blast of summer: Top end-of-summer travel deals - 2015 Previous Next 
Georgia: Discover the best of Georgia's capital with Loews Atlanta hotels and the Atlanta Bucket List package, starting at $199. With the kids out of school and a more flexible summer travel itinerary, guests can take advantage of up to 20% off stays on low-occupancy days. The package includes two nights' accommodations, two Atlanta City Passes, a $10 gift card to The Varsity and a special arrival amenity. For full details, see loewshotels.com/atlanta-hotel. (Courtesy Loews Atlanta Hotels) 
Alberta: Take the ultimate Rockies road trip this summer with Fairmont Hotels & Resorts. The F-scape Road Trip through the Rockies package includes a BMW rental from Avis and an itinerary that will have guests driving between three iconic Fairmont properties - Fairmont Jasper Park Lodge, Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise and Fairmont Banff Springs - while enjoying stunning views of the Rocky Mountains and Banff National Park. Rates start at $3,783 for six nights for two people. See fairmont.com for more details. (Courtesy Fairmont Hotels & Resorts) 
Florida: Here's a deal on a Florida vacation that's just for Canadians! Acqualina Resort & Spa on the Beach, located just north of Miami Beach in Sunny Isles Beach, is offering Canadians accommodations on certain room categories at par with the Canadian dollar for savings of up to 30%. This special rate is available on bookings through Dec. 18, 2015. Acqualina Resort & Spa on the Beach is a Canadian-friendly property and offers Tim Hortons coffee and maple syrup at breakfast and in-suite access to NHL hockey games. For more details, see acqualinaresort.com. (Courtesy Acqualina Resort & Spa on the Beach) 
Quebec: "East Meets Best" is the name of Fairmont Hotels & Resorts' F-scape road trip in Quebec. The package includes a BMW rental from Avis and an itinerary that will take travellers through the most scenic spots in Ottawa and Quebec. Start in Ottawa at the Fairmont Chateau Laurier where you'll canoe the Rideau Canal. Next, head to the Fairmont Le Chateau Montebello, a charming log cabin-style resort situated among lush flora. Finish at the Fairmont Tremblant, where travellers can go on a zip-line adventure. Rates start at $1,441 for three nights for two people. See fairmont.com for more details. (Courtesy Fairmont Hotels & Resorts) 
British Columbia: Discover one of B.C.'s top ski resorts in the summertime. Sun Peaks' Hiking & Sightseeing Stay & Play package lets travellers discover the vibrant wildflowers and mountains of this scenic part of Canada. One night accommodation and a hiking lift ticket is included with the package price. Rates start at $69 per person, per night. Available through Sept. 7, 2015. See sunpeaksresort.com for more information. (Courtesy Sun Peaks/ROYCE SIHLIS) 
Ontario: Travel north of Toronto to Cobble Beach Golf Resort on Georgian Bay and experience fantastic golf in a spectacular setting. The Inn Stay-and-Play package includes one round on the Doug Carrick-designed golf course or a spa treatment, accommodations and a grab-and-go breakfast for two. Rates start at $135 per person. See cobblebeach.com for more information. (Courtesy Cobble Beach Golf Resort) 
Mexico: Enjoy one last blast of summer with a Labour Day getaway to Cancun. Guests can save up to 25% when they book a European Plan or Grand Gourmet All-Inclusive stay at the Grand Residences Riviera Cancun for Labour Day weekend. Rates start at $218 with the European Plan and $320 for the Grand Gourmet All-Inclusive plan. For more details, see grandresidencesrivieracancun.com. (Courtesy Grand Residences Riviera Cancun) 
British Columbia: Book your winter vacation in Whistler before the end of summer and save on your ski vacation to the Pan Pacific Whistler's two properties: the Pan Pacific Whistler Village Centre and Pan Pacific Whistler Mountainside. Save up to 25% on bookings up to seven nights and up to 35% on bookings of eight nights or more. Book by Aug. 31, 2015. See panpacific.com for more details. (Courtesy Pan Pacific Whistler) 
Oregon: Visit hip Portland this summer and discover the bikes and beer the city has to offer. The Bikes & Brews package at The Nines includes accommodations in the iconic Meier & Frank Building, two rental bikes or one tandem bike, a biking map of Portland, two Fat Tire Beers from New Belgium Brewing and two local microbrews and housemade chips. For more details or to book, see thenines.com/bike-brew and use code BNBPKG. (Courtesy The Nines) 
Across North America: Make your stay at a Four Points hotel fantastic this summer! Participating Four Points hotels across North America are offering the Weekends are Fantastic at Four Points offer. Available through Aug. 31, 2015, this offer includes two adult tickets from Cineplex to see Fantastic Four when booking a two night stay between Thursday and Sunday. Tickets will be mailed to travellers after their Four Points stay. For more details or to book, visit north-america.starwoodoffers.com/four-points-fantastic-four and use code FPFOUR. (Courtesy Four Points)
